attributes.action: Make live televised debates before elections mandatory.
attributes.additional_details: this is a chance for us to ask really important questions of those seeking the highest office in the land apart from the Monarch, we should never be denied this opportunity.
attributes.background: It has been announced that there will be no televised debates for the upcoming snap general election. We the signatories believe that for the country to make a proper choice this should be mandatory at all General Elections.
